name.en: Nerva the Imprisoned Deity of Creation
name.ja: <ruby>創<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>獄<rt>ごく</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby>ネルヴァ

text.en:
3 "Artmegia" monsters
Must first be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) in Defense Position by Tributing 3 monsters with different Types. You can only Special Summon "Nerva the Imprisoned Deity of Creation" once per turn. Cannot be destroyed by card effects while a card is in the Field Zone. Once per turn, when you activate an "Artmegia" monster's effect (Quick Effect): You can make the activated effect become "Destroy all cards your opponent controls".
